function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of harmful fuels for lighting","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Slow progress in the adoption of cleaner fuels","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low global access to clean cooking","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Indoor air pollution due to biomass and coal smoke","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Premature deaths due to the use of coal and solid biomass for cooking","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation leading to loss of productivity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High temperatures due to lack of ventilation leading to loss of productivity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cost-effectiveness of indoor climate on high-value work in the office","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differences in noise levels and communication speed in open-plan vs. closed offices","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conversion to open-plan offices may lead to a higher risk of contagious disease spread due to increased interaction and reduced physical barriers.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems in refurbishment alternatives leading to poor indoor air quality and high indoor temperatures.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mechanical cooling of supply air to lower high temperatures may not effectively control the spread of contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in the toilets may lead to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Different office plans may impact the spread of contagious diseases due to varying spatial layouts and density of people.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High occupant density can contribute to the spread of respiratory diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High indoor temperatures causing a decrement in productivity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of communicable respiratory diseases through airborne aerosols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low ventilation rates leading to higher prevalence of respiratory diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control of temperature leading to excessively high indoor temperatures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dismantling of partition walls may disrupt the containment of contagious diseases and facilitate their spread within the building.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workspace design may not consider physical distancing measures, leading to a higher risk of disease transmission among employees.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Refurbishment plans and changes in indoor climate may impact ventilation and air quality, potentially affecting disease transmission rates within the building.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited use of open-plan office space","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness of economic impact of indoor risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of adequate ventilation and cooling due to increased space efficiency","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased climate","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in welfare policies may impose large welfare losses on high-wage workers","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pandemic events impacting global economies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unpredictability and exogeneity of pandemic events","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Loss of industry-level details due to country-level data analysis","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Data underestimates true sales figures and installed base of robots","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack available only until 2014, limiting the analysis of pandemic impact","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of mathematical models and calculations","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in acquiring new and challenging skill sets leading to a persistent increase in dropouts","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pandemics leading to increases in the gini coefficient and inequality","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uneven impact of robots on coefficients","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Skill-biased technological changes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pandemics with
